an2.1:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati jetavane anathapindikassa arame.
an2.1:2.5: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco passati coram agucarim rajano gahetva vividha kammakarana karente;
an2.1:2.6: kasahipi talente, vettehipi talente, addhadandakehipi talente, hatthampi chindante, padampi chindante, hatthapadampi chindante, kannampi chindante, nasampi chindante, kannanasampi chindante, bilangathalikampi karonte, sankhamundikampi karonte, rahumukhampi karonte, jotimalikampi karonte, hatthapajjotikampi karonte, erakavattikampi karonte, cirakavasikampi karonte, eneyyakampi karonte, balisamamsikampi karonte, kahapanikampi karonte, kharapatacchikampi karonte, palighaparivattikampi karonte, palalapithakampi karonte, tattenapi telena osincante, sunakhehipi khadapente, jivantampi sule uttasente, asinapi sisam chindante.
an2.1:3.2: ‘yatharupanam kho papakanam kammanam hetu coram agucarim rajano gahetva vividha kammakarana karenti;
an2.1:3.3: kasahipi talenti, vettehipi talenti, addhadandakehipi talenti, hatthampi chindanti, padampi chindanti, hatthapadampi chindanti, kannampi chindanti, nasampi chindanti, kannanasampi chindanti, bilangathalikampi karonti, sankhamundikampi karonti, rahumukhampi karonti, jotimalikampi karonti, hatthapajjotikampi karonti, erakavattikampi karonti, cirakavasikampi karonti, eneyyakampi karonti, balisamamsikampi karonti, kahapanikampi karonti, kharapatacchikampi karonti, palighaparivattikampi karonti, palalapithakampi karonti, tattenapi telena osincanti, sunakhehipi khadapenti, jivantampi sule uttasenti, asinapi sisam chindanti.
an2.1:3.4: Ahanceva kho pana evarupam papakammam kareyyam, mampi rajano gahetva evarupa vividha kammakarana kareyyum;
an2.1:3.6: So ditthadhammikassa vajjassa bhito na paresam pabhatam vilumpanto carati.
an2.1:4.3: ‘kayaduccaritassa kho pana papako dukkho vipako abhisamparayam, vaciduccaritassa papako dukkho vipako abhisamparayam, manoduccaritassa papako dukkho vipako abhisamparayam.
an2.1:4.4: Ahanceva kho pana kayena duccaritam careyyam, vacaya duccaritam careyyam, manasa duccaritam careyyam.
an2.1:4.5: Kinca tam yaham na kayassa bheda param marana apayam duggatim vinipatam nirayam upapajjeyyan’ti.
an2.1:4.6: So samparayikassa vajjassa bhito kayaduccaritam pahaya kayasucaritam bhaveti, vaciduccaritam pahaya vacisucaritam bhaveti, manoduccaritam pahaya manosucaritam bhaveti, suddham attanam pariharati.
an2.1:4.10: ‘ditthadhammikassa vajjassa bhayissama, samparayikassa vajjassa bhayissama, vajjabhiruno bhavissama vajjabhayadassavino’ti.
an2.1:4.12: Vajjabhiruno, bhikkhave, vajjabhayadassavino etam patikankham yam parimuccissati sabbavajjehi”ti.
an2.2:1.3: Yanca gihinam agaram ajjhavasatam civarapindapatasenasanagilanapaccayabhesajjaparikkharanuppadanattham padhanam, yanca agarasma anagariyam pabbajitanam sabbupadhipatinissaggattham padhanam.
an2.2:1.4: Imani kho, bhikkhave, dve padhanani durabhisambhavani lokasmim.
an2.2:2.1: Etadaggam, bhikkhave, imesam dvinnam padhananam yadidam sabbupadhipatinissaggattham padhanam.
an2.3:1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, ekaccassa kayaduccaritam katam hoti, akatam hoti kayasucaritam;
an2.3:1.4: vaciduccaritam katam hoti, akatam hoti vacisucaritam;
an2.3:1.5: manoduccaritam katam hoti, akatam hoti manosucaritam.
an2.3:1.6: So ‘kayaduccaritam me katan’ti tappati, ‘akatam me kayasucaritan’ti tappati;
an2.3:1.7: ‘vaciduccaritam me katan’ti tappati, ‘akatam me vacisucaritan’ti tappati;
an2.3:1.8: ‘manoduccaritam me katan’ti tappati, ‘akatam me manosucaritan’ti tappati.
an2.3:1.9: Ime kho, bhikkhave, dve dhamma tapaniya”ti.
an2.4:1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, ekaccassa kayasucaritam katam hoti, akatam hoti kayaduccaritam;
an2.4:1.4: vacisucaritam katam hoti, akatam hoti vaciduccaritam;
an2.4:1.5: manosucaritam katam hoti, akatam hoti manoduccaritam.
an2.4:1.6: So ‘kayasucaritam me katan’ti na tappati, ‘akatam me kayaduccaritan’ti na tappati;
an2.4:1.7: ‘vacisucaritam me katan’ti na tappati, ‘akatam me vaciduccaritan’ti na tappati;
an2.4:1.8: ‘manosucaritam me katan’ti na tappati, ‘akatam me manoduccaritan’ti na tappati.
an2.4:1.9: Ime kho, bhikkhave, dve dhamma atapaniya”ti.
an2.5:1.2: ya ca asantutthita kusalesu dhammesu, ya ca appativanita padhanasmim.
an2.5:1.4: ‘kamam taco ca nharu ca atthi ca avasissatu, sarire upassussatu mamsalohitam, yam tam purisathamena purisaviriyena purisaparakkamena pattabbam na tam apapunitva viriyassa santhanam bhavissati’ti.
an2.5:1.5: Tassa mayham, bhikkhave, appamadadhigata sambodhi, appamadadhigato anuttaro yogakkhemo.
an2.5:1.7: ‘kamam taco ca nharu ca atthi ca avasissatu, sarire upassussatu mamsalohitam, yam tam purisathamena purisaviriyena purisaparakkamena pattabbam na tam apapunitva viriyassa santhanam bhavissati’ti, tumhepi, bhikkhave, nacirasseva—
an2.5:1.8: yassatthaya kulaputta sammadeva agarasma anagariyam pabbajanti, tadanuttaram—brahmacariyapariyosanam dittheva dhamme sayam abhinna sacchikatva upasampajja viharissatha.
an2.5:1.11: Kamam taco ca nharu ca atthi ca avasissatu, sarire upassussatu mamsalohitam, yam tam purisathamena purisaviriyena purisaparakkamena pattabbam na tam apapunitva viriyassa santhanam bhavissati’ti.
an2.6:1.3: Ya ca samyojaniyesu dhammesu assadanupassita, ya ca samyojaniyesu dhammesu nibbidanupassita.
an2.6:1.4: Samyojaniyesu, bhikkhave, dhammesu assadanupassi viharanto ragam na pajahati, dosam na pajahati, moham na pajahati.
an2.6:1.5: Ragam appahaya, dosam appahaya, moham appahaya na parimuccati jatiya jaraya maranena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upayasehi.
an2.6:2.1: Samyojaniyesu, bhikkhave, dhammesu nibbidanupassi viharanto ragam pajahati, dosam pajahati, moham pajahati.
an2.6:2.2: Ragam pahaya, dosam pahaya, moham pahaya, parimuccati jatiya jaraya maranena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upayasehi.
an2.7:1.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, dve dhamma kanha”ti.
an2.8:1.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, dve dhamma sukka”ti.
an2.9:1.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, dve sukka dhamma lokam na paleyyum, nayidha pannayetha matati va matucchati va matulaniti va acariyabhariyati va garunam darati va.
an2.9:1.5: Sambhedam loko agamissa, yatha ajelaka kukkutasukara sonasingala.
an2.9:1.6: Yasma ca kho, bhikkhave, ime dve sukka dhamma lokam palenti tasma pannayati matati va matucchati va matulaniti va acariyabhariyati va garunam darati va”ti.
